stories.text:
Hey guys!

I've been building famewall for the last 2 months as a solo founder. I landed a first paying customer at the beginning of this month and have been steadily growing the product.

I'm happy to announce that I launched the product today at https://www.producthunt.com/posts/famewall

Would love to know your thoughts & feedback
stories.title: Show HN: Famewall.io – Social testimonials in under 2 minutes
Gigaton scale carbon capture using algae
Multi-Country – Acute, severe hepatitis of unknown origin in children
Large Numbers of Entities with Mass ECS in Unreal Engine 5
'Highly contagious' disease kills dozens of horses at Colorado facility
Track post-publication changes to online news articles

stories.text:
Hi there,

I need to take note of existing content and extract everything as my new content without losing the source).

This question could be similar to Ask HN: How do you manage “knowledge” (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=16412343), but I'm not searching for a fully integrated system to take notes, manage the calendar and lose focus immediately trying to adapt to a workflow.

I'm searching for something to tag selections with preconfigured labels, comment using simple text/markdown and capable of visualizing the activity and exporting it as text.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you manage notes on websites in 2022?
